price: O Vjerovjesniče, Allah je dovoljan tebi i vjernicima koji te slijede.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ حَسۡبُكَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu ḥasbuka al-lahu wamani ittabaʿaka mina al-mu'minīna
